item.description:
What is your version of a Luscious Libation?

Is it a One-Eyed Gypsy‘s Voodoo Doll — Milagro Reposado, cilantro, tangerine serrano chili syrup, lime, pineapple, Angostura and orange bitters. A wonderfully spicy and orangey delight?
How about a Spicy Gingerman: vanilla vodka, hazelnut liqueur, butterscotch schnapps, and ginger beer?
Well whatever you fancy, join us for a taste at Teresa's Italian Eatery in the Martini Lounge.

"The Martini Lounge is a great place to meet friends, make new friends, watch a game one of our three large, flat-panel televisions or just relax. It is elegant without being stuffy or pretentious. Our bartenders prepare the best martini's and cocktails you've ever enjoyed. Stop by today to unwind after work or come early to enjoy a drink before your meal. Regardless of why you come, you'll be sure to have a great time!"

This event will be a cross-post!
item.name: Luscious Libation
